## Description {#details}

This represents the common interface of the individual transaction.

Each class implements the logic for doing one specific modification on the IR via the <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/typepromotiontransaction">TypePromotionTransaction</a>.

Definition at line 3243 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.

Constructor of the action.

The constructor performs the related action on the IR.

## Public Member Functions

### commit() {#a5ca3e90c4af1befbf0042a16eb7f0a8d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::TypePromotionTransaction::TypePromotionAction::commit ()</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Advocate every change made by this action.

When the results on the IR of the action are to be kept, it is important to call this function, otherwise hidden information may be kept forever.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l03265">3265</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### undo() {#a6796a27b82fc2556d472fe47e1ba810c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::TypePromotionTransaction::TypePromotionAction::undo ()</>}>
Undo the modification done by this action.

When this method is called, the IR must be in the same state as it was before this action was applied. 
<SectionUser title="Precondition">
Undoing the action works if and only if the IR is in the exact same state as it was directly after this action was applied.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l03260">3260</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
